title: Atlas with position controllers doesn't work with drcsim-2.0 due to new naming scheme

content.raw:
The "atlas_position_controllers.launch" launch file does not correctly spawn a atlas with position controllers anymore, as the [position_controllers.yaml](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/45a23d87af80af8bbc467a58382dba903f8572d7/ros/atlas_utils/config/position_controllers.yaml) hasn't been updated with the new controller naming structure.

Error message (similar one for every joint):

```
#!

[ERROR] [1359968924.260484511, 0.025000000]: couldn't find a param for atlas_controller/gains/r_arm_ely/
```
content.html:
The "atlas_position_controllers.launch" launch file does not correctly spawn a atlas with position controllers anymore, as the position_controllers.yaml hasn't been updated with the new controller naming structure.

Error message (similar one for every joint):

[ERROR] [1359968924.260484511, 0.025000000]: couldn't find a param for atlas_controller/gains/r_arm_ely/
